Text: Ok, any idea how long he will be off the Air?

He'll be back Monday for sure. He's usually never off for more than a week except summer vacations or christmas. But still you should get used to breaks every 3 or 4 weeks and a lot of 3 day weeks if you are a new listener.
500,000,000$ a year, constant holidays, 3 days a week of work... what a life, what a life.
